 2019-11972019-08-07HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActPatent Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Patented Medicines Regulations (Additional Factors and Information Reporting Requirements)
PrecisRegulations Amending the PATENTED MEDICINES REGULATIONS (ADDITIONAL FACTORS AND INFORMATION REPORTING REQUIREMENTS) in order to equip the Patented Medicine Prices Review Board with the regulatory tools and information reporting authorities it needs to effectively protect Canadian consumers from excessively priced patented medicines in today's regulatory environment.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0298 Publication Date: 2019-08-21
